test-case.description: Attempts to reference the "function-name" function with arity one.

test-case.name: fn-function-name-020

test-case.description: Evaluates the "function-name" function with the argument referring to a partial function application.

test-case.name: fn-function-name-022
test-case.description: Evaluates the "function-name" function with the argument referring a global user-defined function.

test-case.description: Evaluates the "function-name" function with the argument referring to a function item returned by function coercion.
